GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.15.54
GSD.description:
can: gs_usb: gs_usb_open/close(): fix memory leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.54 by commit 0e60230bc64355c80abe993d1719fdb318094e20, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit d08e973a77d128b25e01a08c34d89593fdf222da. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: can: gs_usb: gs_usb_open/close(): fix memory leak
